info.brief_description: fictional girls from deferent media transform in different ways.
info.description:
girls from different media(cartoons, tv shows, games, books, ect) get transformed in different ways. how they transform is up to you.

Rules.

Rule 1. leave a "something else" option so there can me multiple ideas of how and what the character transforms into.

Rule 2. don't "end" a story path before it starts. I will delete those

Rule 3. no insulting religion

Rule 4. go mildly if you have the characters cursing(verbally)

Rule 5. no killing off the characters

Rule 6. no power trips, if a character is made older, that does not mean that younger characters have to obey them just because they're older

have fun. :)
